Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Darmanian Way, south of the Oceancrest Guard Barracks.
Room.LongDescription: The large building on the north houses the more than a thousand guards who patrol the city and the city walls, protecting the citizens of Oceancrest from every and any possible threat to their peaceful existance. There is a Guard Surplus and Supply shop on the south side of the street, selling various extra equipment usually used by the guard patrols.
